text: Yā pana bhikkhunī anupasampannāya uttarimanussadhammaṃ āroceyya bhūtasmiṃ pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī anupasampannāya uttarimanussadhammaṃ āroceyya bhūtasmiṃ pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 104. Should any bhikkhunī report (her own) superior human state to an unordained person, when it is factual, it is to be confessed.
